::DarkMouse::

"I have no idea. If anything, they may just join us and our group 
gets stronger. But I hope he will be kinder to you and your old 
friends than he has been with me."  She looked down and walked away.

She went tot he kitchen for some ice for her face.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, richard f allen <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Drillbit::
> 
> "Ok, I'll wait as long as it gets. Say, what does Megatron going to 
do
> with the Pred's Hell Beast left behind?"
